## McDonald's

mniam mniamn

### Wczytanie danych i rysunki

```{r}
library(tseries)
mcd<- get.hist.quote(instrument = "MCD", provider = "yahoo",
                          quote = "Close", start = "2018-01-01", end = "2019-12-31")
mcd <- as.numeric(mcd)
```


```{r}
plot(mcd, type = "l")
```
